main event: An unidentified object was observed hovering and moving east-southeast over Olmsted AFB, Middletown, PA, on June 13, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as circular, with a hovering nature, The observation lasted for 5 seconds, A witness characterized the object as a balloon, The object appeared white and transparent, and was estimated to be about 15 feet in diameter.
witness description: Chief Tower Operator at the Air Force Base, male, age 27
